sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { StoreContext } from '../contexts/StoreContext'; class Checkout extends Component { static contextType = StoreContext; render() { const {cart} = this.context return (
{/*
Qty {cart.quantity}
Total {cart.totalAmount}
*/}
Qty {cart.quantity}
Total {cart.totalAmount}
); } } export default Checkout;
